eduversum.name: Krusader
eduversum.description: A simple, easy, powerful, graphical, twin-panel file manager. It provides all the file management features you could possibly want. For example extensive archive handling, mounted file system support, FTP, advanced search module, viewer/editor, directory synchronization, file content comparisons, powerful batch renaming and much, much more. Krusader supports many archive formats (if installed): ace, arj, bzip2, deb, gzip, iso, lha, rar, rpm, tar, zip and 7-zip and handles other KIOSlaves such as smb:// or sftp://.
